snippet: Adopting a shot clock may be a natural next step for college lacrosse, which is concerned about its appeal to viewers as more games are televised.
abstract: College lacrosse, often called the fastest sport on two feet, has slowed considerably in recent years, sparking debate over using a shot clock to speed up the game.
lead_paragraph: Adopting a shot clock may be a natural next step for college lacrosse, which is concerned about its appeal to viewers as more games are televised.

headline.seo: College Lacrosse Considers Shot Clock to Speed Games
headline.main: Stalled Sport Ponders New Tactic: A Shot Clock
headline.print_headline: Stalled Sport Ponders New Tactic: A Shot Clock
